Member Function Documentation

WString TimeZone::Format (  const WCHAR *  wchr_format = L"GMT: %o DST: %d",
const WCHAR *  wchr_invalid_offset = L"n/a",
const WCHAR *  wchr_invalid_dst = L"n/a"
)  const
 

Formats a TimeZoneString by setting tokens for offset (o) and dst (d) restrictions: token o is mandatory and must preceed optional token d !! and replace invalid values with set characters e.g.: Format(L"GMT(o) DST(d)",L"-",L"n/a") may have following output, when dst is invalid: GMT(+13:15) DST(n/a)
